name: Frozen Device
description: Summon an ancient portal, which arms after 1.5 seconds,  When triggered the enemy is teleported to you, immobilized for 3 seconds, dealt 1799 Frost Damage, and afflicted with Major Maim, reducing their damage done by 10% for 4 seconds.  You can have up to 3 Frozen Devices active at a time.
effectLines: Teleported enemies have their damage done reduced.
coefDescription: Summon an ancient portal, which arms after 1.5 seconds,  When triggered the enemy is teleported to you, immobilized for 3 seconds, dealt $1 Frost Damage, and afflicted with Major Maim, reducing their damage done by 10% for 4 seconds.  You can have up to 3 Frozen Devices active at a time.
